Desc.entry: A local community centre. Activities include luncheon club, craft club, men's, women's and youth groups. Also runs a soup kitchen every Bank Holiday.

ContactName.entry: Delroy Hall, Local Pastor and Chairperson

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Wed, Thurs & Sun (office times); 3rd & 4th Mon in the month (committee meeting in Jan, Apr, Jul & Oct)

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 2
